LEVEL 17
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: LEVEL 17
By Y.K.TAN on Saturday, January 5, 2002 - 09:15 pm:

LEVEL 17:(THE DUCKHEADED DUCKEN STAGE,LOL)

At the start of the stage,you can move all the way left,or you can take the gold coin,if you want. After that,wait for the ducken above you,to shoot,before jumping up the metal ledge,as quick as lightning face,right,create a box,than jump up the metal ledge. Face right,and destroy the box beneeath the fire,and the fire,will be toasted,when it drop. Facing left,while ducking down,create a box,and stand on it. Wait for ducken above you to shoot,than jump p the metal ledge. Face right,create a box,stand on it,quickly jump on metal ledge. Now facing left,ducking down,create a box beneath you,wait for the ducken above to shoot,than jump up get the key,MIND YOU,IT'S SPEED OF ATTACKING IS VERY FAST. After that,jump down to the lower metal ledge,than while holding to the right,and still jumping,jump to the right metal ledge part. Ducking Down,create boxes,on the right,and create box,and jump up and win,but don't get killed by the ducken's attack,and there you win it.
